meanings.definition: A traditional story sometimes popularly regarded as historical but unauthenticated.
meanings.sent1: The children loved hearing about the ancient legends of brave heroes.
meanings.sent2: Legends of King Arthur and his knights are well-known tales.
meanings.sent3: Grandma always tells us legends about magical creatures living in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The legends of the old castle whispered secrets of hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The legends of the lost city painted a vivid picture of its grandeur.

meanings.definition: An extremely famous or notorious person, especially in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: Michael Jordan is a basketball legend known for his incredible skills.
meanings.sent2: Legends like Elvis Presley continue to inspire new generations.
meanings.sent3: The local legend of the town was the baker who could make the best pies.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, Coco Chanel is a true legend.
meanings.sent5: The legendary musician's songs will always be remembered.
